lines.text: Oops! Sorry 'bout that. Guess I must have given it a little too much power.
*Studdering* Uh, your Highness-es, I'm Tetsuya Wakatsuki from Earth. I'm 19 years old, and I'm a photographer, and also apparently still a virgin.
Please Daddy please call off your attack on those poor people who live on the holy planet.
Well I wanted to tell you that Tetsuya's my fiance.
So as a wedding present, can you please spare Tetsuya's people?
